SerialThread Class Reference

This SerialThread is launched by CubeCommunications to program the Qube. More...

 Emits the finished percentage, connected to CubeCommunication::programmingPercentage() Signal.

 Emitted when programming failed, connected to CubeCommunication::programmingFailed() Signal.

 Emitted when programming was successful, connected to CubeCommunication::programmingSuccessful() Signal.

 holds the number of figures that are going to be programmed

Detailed Description

This SerialThread is launched by CubeCommunications to program the Qube.

Parameters:
[in] *port - Pointer to a QextSerialPort Object
[in] data - QByteArray containing the Data (see MainWindow::prepareProgramming()
[in] *parent - optional Pointer to the Parent QObject
